Sentencas: One of the major advantages of SOFCs is their high fuel flexibility.
Titulo: Fuel flexibility of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Next to natural gas and hydrogen, which are today's most common fuels for SOFC-systems and cell-/stack-testing respectively, various other fuels are applicable as well.
Titulo: Fuel flexibility of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: In the literature, a number of promising results show that available fuels as propane, butane, ammonia, gasoline, diesel etc. can be applied.
Titulo: Fuel flexibility of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Here, the performance of an anode supported cell operated in specialized single cell test benches with different gaseous and liquid fuels and reformates thereof is presented.
Titulo: Fuel flexibility of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Fuels as ammonia, dissolved urea (AddBlue(TM)), methane/steam and ethanol/water mixtures can directly be fed to the cell, whereas propane and diesel require external reforming.
Titulo: Fuel flexibility of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: It is shown that in case of a stable fuel supply the cell performance with such fuels is similar to that of appropriate mixtures of H-2, N-2, CO, CO2, and steam, if the impact of endothermic reforming or decomposition reactions is considered.
Titulo: Fuel flexibility of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Even though a stable fuel cell operation with such fuels is possible in a single cell test bench, it should be pointed out that an appropriate fuel processing will be mandatory on the system level.
Titulo: Fuel flexibility of solid oxide fuel cells
